attributes.action: UEFA restructure ticket allocations and locations of finals and tournaments.
attributes.additional_details: The stadiums chosen aren't suitable sometimes due to location and capacity Europa league final in Basel 2016 capacity 34000 having been to a numerous European finals, I know that Liverpool alone could have filled the stadium twice over luckily on this occasion Seville didn't hardly take any fans which was lucky for Liverpool it helped the demand. Europa league final 2019 London derby in Azerbaijan 6,000 tickets each in a 70,000 capacity! The UEFA family creating a black market for ticket sites.
attributes.background: All governing bodies need  to restructure how they choose venues for finals and how they allocate tickets for finals, the allocation 16,000 each for champions league and 6,000 each Europa league leaving more tickets to so called neutrals and UEFA family which create a market for these ticket sites.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the UEFA, and not the UK Government or Parliament.
